member.name: T:Senkel.IdentityRenderer`1
member.summary: Represents a renderer that always returns the initially set identity value without any modification.
member.typeparam: The type of the identity value to render.

member.name: M:Senkel.IdentityRenderer`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that returns the specified value in the method.
member.param: The value to return in the method.

member.name: T:Senkel.IRenderer`1
member.summary: Represents an object that is capable of rendering an image of the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type of the image object to be created.

member.name: M:Senkel.IRenderer`1.Render
member.summary: Returns an image object that represents the current state of the rendered object.
